content: Following the conventions established here: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/icd.html can we record in AU Base (at least) that the URI for ICD10-AM is http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-am?
I guess confirming this with IHPA would also be a good thing (https://ace.ihpa.gov.au/)
@Stephen Chu Can you assist with the IHPA side of things? :)
